Text: Sorry, no dutch subs with this one.
mabye i cant read but doesnt it say 5.1 audio and english subs?????   Well it has none of these..Good pic but dissapointing when the info is wrong.. V10A8

I downloaded the first episode and I only have Dutch subs for that one, no English. Can you check and confirm this Squeezert?

Thanks for the Series, great quality... also enjoyed the 1978 series from you!
This one actually only contains the 1st season, English Audio with optional Dutch subs.

I have to stand corrected - it is the complete 1980 season ( http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0080221/ )  in MKV format, but only with Dutch subs, no English ones. English subs are here: http://www.opensubtitles.org/en/search2/sublanguageid-eng/movieyearsign-1/movieyear-1980/moviename-battlestar+galactica+
